skill.name: Lightning Rain
skill.desc: Ao Shin fires a barrage of 20 lightning strikes at random enemies. Each strike deals magic damage and drains 10 Mana from his target.

skill.name: Binding Eclipse
skill.desc: Aphelios uses his infernumcannon to blast bolts in a cone towards his target, each dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit. Subsequent hits against the same enemy deal 80% less damage. Then he uses his Gravitum cannon to stun all enemies hit.

skill.name: Black Hole
skill.desc:
Aurelion Sol summons an unstable black hole underneath a random enemy. After 2 seconds it implodes, dealing magic damage to all enemies in the area and increasing their damage taken by 20% for 10 seconds.

Black holes generated after 18 seconds of combat are larger and deal 20% more damage.

skill.name: Tempered Fate
skill.desc: Bard sends magical energy toward the largest group of enemies, stunning them for a few seconds and causing them to take increased damage while stunned. If he hits at least 1 enemy, Bard dances in celebration.

skill.name: Unbreakable
skill.desc: Braum raises his shield for 4 seconds, reducing his damage taken from that direction.

skill.name: Windblast
skill.desc:
Passive: Daeja's attacks launch three barrages that each deal bonus magic damage and reduce the target's Magic Resist by 5.

Active: Daeja sends a wind blast toward the largest group of enemies, dealing magic damage.

skill.name: Pale Cascade
skill.desc: Diana shields herself for 6 seconds and summons number of orbs around her. These orbs burst magic damage when they hit an enemy. When the final orb bursts, her shield refreshes.

skill.name: Mystic Shot
skill.desc: Ezreal fires an energy bolt towards his target. The first enemy hit takes magic damage and grants Ezreal 10% bonus Attack Speed, stacking up to 5 times.

skill.name: Mega Gnar
skill.desc: Gnar tarnsforms into Mega Form, jumping to his target and knocking up nearby enemies for 1 second. Gnar also gains Attack Damage and Armor, but reduces his Attack Range to 1.

skill.name: Quickdraw
skill.desc:
Passive: Graves' attacks spread in a cone of 4 bullets in front of him, each striking the first enemy hit for 100% of his Attack Damage.

Active: Graves dashes towards his target, quickly fires two attacks, and grants himself Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Onslaught of Shadows
skill.desc: Hecarim summons spectral riders that charge through his target, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies hit.

skill.name: Egg Toss
skill.desc: Heimerdinger lobs an egg at the highest Health enemy, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 0.5 second.

skill.name: Golden Scales
skill.desc: Idas hardens her scales for 2 seconds, reducing incoming damage. She then roars, healing herself and shielding other allies for 5 seconds. The shield grants 30% attack speed while it holds.

skill.name: Counter Strike
skill.desc: Jax enters a defensive stance for 2 seconds, dodgings all incoming attacks. When the stance ends, he strikes all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and stunning them.

skill.name: Mercurial Justice
skill.desc:
Jayce transforms into his melee form, then slams the ground around his target, dealing magic damage and  gains bonus 45 Armor and Magic Resist for the rest of combat.

Mercury Judgement: Jayce calls lightning upon his target, smiting them for Magic damage and dealing an additional magic damage to other enemies in the area. He then heals for health and additional 20% per enemy struck.

skill.name: Tidal Burst
skill.desc: Kai'sa fires missiles split between her target and nearby enemies that each deal magic damage.This increases by 2 missiles each cast, up to Maximum missiles. When at maximum missiles, each missiles deals 10% more damage.

skill.name: Inner Flame
skill.desc: Karma fires a burst of energy towards her target, dealing magic damage in a small area around the first enemy hit.

skill.name: Dragon's Rage
skill.desc: Lee Sin kicks his target, stunning them for 1.25 seconds and knocking them back. The target and all enemies they hit take magic damage.

skill.name: Solar Barrier
skill.desc: Leona creates a barrier around herself, reducing all incoming damage for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Watch Out!
skill.desc: Lillia strikes a small area around her target's current location, dealing magic damage spread amongst all enemies hit and bonus magic damage to the enemy at the center of the blast.

skill.name: Whimsy
skill.desc: Lulu enchants the nearest units. Enchanted allies gain Attack Speed for 5 seconds. Enchanted enemies are stunned and transformed into harmless dragonlings for 1 seconds. If there are fewer units nearby, Lulu will enchant herself.

skill.name: Cosmic Spark
skill.desc: Lux fires a star towards the farthest enemy, dealing magic damage to the first enemy struck, and to subsequent enemies.

skill.name: Coral Shield
skill.desc: Malphite shields himself for 5 seconds.

skill.name: Fury of the Dawn
skill.desc: Nasus surrounds him self in light for 6 seconds, gaining maximum health and dealing magic damage to adjacent enemies every second.

skill.name: Primal Surge
skill.desc: Nidalee transforms into Cougar Form for the rest of combat, reducing her Attack Range to 1 and gaining bonus movement speed and Attack Speed. While in cougar form, every 3rd attack swipes her target physical damage.

skill.name: Apotheosis
skill.desc: Nilah cracks her whip-blade at her target, dashing through them and dealing magic damage. If this does damage to a shield, she steals % of the damage she deals to it for 4 seconds. If her target is shielded or killed, she instantly recasts.

skill.name: Fireballs!
skill.desc: Nomsy bellows, lobbing a massive fireball towards her current target that explodes on impact, dealing magic damage to enemies within 1 hex, and bouncing additional fireballs outward that deal % of the damage.

skill.name: Fireballs!
skill.desc: Nomsy bellows, lobbing a massive fireball towards her current target that explodes on impact, dealing magic damage to enemies within 1 hex, and bouncing additional fireballs outward that deal % of the damage.

skill.name: Fireballs!
skill.desc: Nomsy bellows, lobbing a massive fireball towards her current target that explodes on impact, dealing magic damage to enemies within 1 hex, and bouncing additional fireballs outward that deal % of the damage.

skill.name: Consume
skill.desc: Nunu encourages Willump to bite his target, dealing magic damage. If Willump's target has less Health than he does before the bite, it deals an additional 50% damage.

skill.name: Recklessness
skill.desc:
Passive: Olaf seeks glorious death, permanently gaining 5 Attack Damage (10 in Hyper Roll) whenever he dies.

Active: Olaf strikes his target, dealing physical damage and gaining Attack Speed for 4 seconds. If he's below 50% Health, the Attack Speed is doubled.

skill.name: Aegis Assault
skill.desc:
Passive: Pantheon takes less damage.

Active: Pantheon braces his shield for 2 seconds, doubling the effectiveness of his passive and dealing physical damage in the area in front of him over the duration. Enemies hit have their incoming healing reduced by 50% for 3 seconds.

skill.name: Elemental Blade
skill.desc: Qiyana dashes to the best position to strike enemies with her blade, dealing magic damage in a short line and disarming enemies hit.

skill.name: Disarming Diversion
skill.desc:
Rakan dashes the furthest enemy within his attack range, disarming all units he passes through, and taunting his target.

Then for 4 seconds, Rakan creates a shield on himself and his attacks grant him an additional shield.

skill.name: Iron Bond
skill.desc: Rell forms a tether between herself and her lowest percent health ally, dealing magic damage to all enemies between herself and her bound ally. She also grants herself and her bound ally % of Rell's current Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Unseen Predator
skill.desc: Rengar leaps to the lowest armor enemy, dealing physical damage and next 2 attack gets faster.

skill.name: Warrior's Wrath
skill.desc: Sejuani swings her mace wide, hitting all enemies in a cone magic damage. She quickly strike again, repeating the damage on her target and the enemy directly behind it and stunning them.

skill.name: Last Embrace
skill.desc: Senna launches black mist toward the farthest enemy, striking the first enemy hit and dealing physical damage (% of Attack Damage) on a small area and an additional bonus magic damage to the target hit.

skill.name: Serenade of the Seas
skill.desc: Seraphine sings a serenade of the seas, granting a shield and bonus damage per attack to all allies within 2 hexes for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Knuckle Down
skill.desc: For the next 4 seconds, Sett gains Armor and Magic Resist, and every other punch deals bonus physical damage.

skill.name: Jade Form
skill.desc:
Shi Oh Yu enters Jade stance, gaining damage reduction, immunity to crowd control, and empowering her next 3 attacks with special effects that deal damage.

Attack 1: Deals physical damage and knocks the target into the air for 1 second.
Attack 2: Deals true damage
Attack 3: Ends the stance, dealing physical damage to all enemies in a line and knocking them up for 1 second.

skill.name: Dragon's Descent
skill.desc:
Shyvana transforms into Dragon Form for the rest of combat, replacing her ability with Flame Breath. She then becomes untargetable before dive-bombing the largest group of enemies, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

Flame Breath: Shyvana breathes fire in a cone, dealing magic damage.

skill.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
skill.desc: Skarner shields himself for 8 seconds, and gains Attack Speed while it holds.

skill.name: Tideblossom
skill.desc:
Sohm sends out a tide to an unmarked target, marking them with a Tideblossom transfer to nearby target if the enemy dies.

After 3 casts, his next cast instead summons a vortex under each Tideblossom, daling magic damage to enemies in the area.

skill.name: Starfall
skill.desc:
Passive: While any ally is below 50% Health, Soraka gains an additional 15 mana per attack.

Active: Soraka calls down a shower of stars over the next 2 seconds. Allies are healed each time a star hits them.

skill.name: Rampage
skill.desc:
Sy'fen charges toward the farthest enemy within 2.5 hexes, dealing physical damage and knocking up enemies they pass through.

After charging, Sy'fen bites an enemy, dealing physical damage and ignoring 33% of the target's Armor.

skill.name: Petricite Burst
skill.desc: Sylas whirls his chains, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and shielding himself for 6 seconds. If Sylas has already shielded himself, he hits in a larger area and applies Mana-Reave to enemies hit, increasing the cost of their next ability by 35%.

skill.name: Seastone Volley
skill.desc: Taliyah throws 3 seastones at her target, each dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit.

skill.name: Earthquake
skill.desc: Terra stomps three times causing an earthquake around them, dealing physical damage. At the end of the earthquake Terra's scales are hardened for 8 seconds, granting Armor and Magic Resist.
stats: Armor and Magic Resist Damage Percent: 150% / 200% / 2500%

skill.name: Explosive Charge
skill.desc:
Passive: Tristana grants Nomsy bonus Attack Damage.

Tristana fires up to 1 explosive charges, prioritizing the closest targets without a charge. Charges detonate after 1 seconds, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and an additional magic damage to the target.

skill.name: Blast Potion
skill.desc: Twitch hurls an exploding flask at his target, dealing physical damage and reducing the Armor of enemies hit by 40% for 5 seconds.

skill.name: Dragon Master's Decree
skill.desc: Swain releases his dragonling flock, launching 8 dragonlings toward nearby enemies that each deal magic damage to their target, then return to Swain and heal him for 12% of his missing Health.

skill.name: Chain of Constellations
skill.desc: Varus sends out a cosmic tendril towards his target that strikes the first enemy hit, dealing physical damage and stunning them. Tendrils then spread to 3 nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and stunning them for the remainder of the duration.

skill.name: Transfusion
skill.desc: Vladimir deals magic damage to his target and heals himself.

skill.name: Relentless Storm
skill.desc: Volibear rages, gaining bonus Health. For the rest of combat, every 3rd attack deals bonus magic damage to the target, and magic damage to additional enemies.

skill.name: Crushing Blow
skill.desc: Wukong slams his target with his staff, dealing physical damage and stunning them.

skill.name: Feathers FLY!
skill.desc:
For 4 seconds Xayah's attacks also fire a feather physical damage, and extra feathers at enemies near her target. Feathers are left behind her targets.

At the end of this duration Xayah recalls her feathers. Each one deals physical damage to enemies hit.

skill.name: Sweeping Blade
skill.desc:
Yasuo shields himself for 2 and dashes through his target, slashing nearby enemies physical damage.

Every third cast his slash deals 250% damage, hits a larger area, and knocks up enemies for 1.5 seconds. If Yasuo hits only the last enemy left alive, he repeatedly slashes them until they die.

skill.name: Way of the Hunter
skill.desc: Passive: Yone's basic attacks alternate between dealing bonus magic damage and dealing bonus physical damage.

skill.name: Unstable Current
skill.desc: Zac explodes outward towards enemies within 2 hexes, dealing % of their maximum Health as magic damage and healing himself.

skill.name: Watershock Laser
skill.desc: Zeri fires a water pluse filled with electricity at the closest enemy within 2 hexes, otherwise at the enemy that is closest to the center of the board. The pulse explodes on contact, dealing physical damage and creating a laser behind the target that deals magic damage to all enemies hit.

skill.name: Somersault Assault
skill.desc: Zippy shields himself for 2 seconds and somersaults toward the highest percent health enemy, dealing physical damage and knocking them back slightly.

skill.name: Nothing!
skill.desc: Zoe doesn't have her own spell. As a Spell Thief, she will borrow Abilities from other dimensions during combat and cast them as if they were her own.

skill.name: Grasping Spines
skill.desc: Zyra summons vines in the row with the most enemies, dealing magic damage and stunning them.
